name: Amara Out of the Darkness
description:
Amara has a rare opportunity to escape the laboratory that has held her captive - but also the only home she's ever known. She'll have to fight both friends and enemies in order to gain her freedom.

Controls:

Left click to move Amara around the lab.

Right click or press space to fire.  You have 10 seconds to shoot and if you burn out, a 10 second cooldown.

Collect power-ups as you escape!

Bugs:

Due to things going wrong at the last minute rush hour, the wrong boss went in and the event that ends the game wont trigger, will be fixed after the jam voting period is over along with a lot more polish.

Developed over one week for the Bullet Hell Jam, with the theme "10 seconds."
